asr_rule: Block abuse of exploited vulnerable signed drivers
metadata_comment: Helps prevent exploitation of known vulnerable signed drivers, reducing the risk of kernel-level malware.

asr_rule: Block Adobe Reader from creating child processes
metadata_comment: Limits Adobe Reader's ability to spawn child processes, mitigating potential attack vectors via PDF files.

asr_rule: Block all Office applications from creating child processes
metadata_comment: Prevents Office applications from creating child processes, reducing the risk of macro-based attacks.

asr_rule: Block credential stealing from the Windows local security authority subsystem (lsass.exe)
metadata_comment: Protects against credential dumping attacks by blocking access to LSASS.

asr_rule: Block executable content from email client and webmail
metadata_comment: Prevents execution of malicious code delivered via email clients or webmail, enhancing email security.

asr_rule: Block executable files from running unless they meet a prevalence, age, or trusted list criterion
metadata_comment: Ensures only trusted and commonly used executable files are allowed to run, reducing the risk of running malicious software.

asr_rule: Block execution of potentially obfuscated scripts
metadata_comment: Prevents execution of scripts that are obfuscated, mitigating script-based malware attacks.

asr_rule: Block JavaScript or VBScript from launching downloaded executable content
metadata_comment: Blocks script engines from executing potentially malicious downloaded content.

asr_rule: Block Office applications from creating executable content
metadata_comment: Reduces the risk of Office macros and exploits creating malicious executable files.

asr_rule: Block Office applications from injecting code into other processes
metadata_comment: Prevents Office applications from injecting code into other processes, mitigating exploit techniques.

asr_rule: Block Office communication application from creating child processes
metadata_comment: Prevents communication apps like Outlook from creating child processes, reducing the risk of phishing and email-based attacks.

asr_rule: Block persistence through WMI event subscription
metadata_comment: Mitigates persistence mechanisms by blocking malicious WMI event subscriptions.

asr_rule: Block process creations originating from PSExec and WMI commands
metadata_comment: Prevents lateral movement and remote execution attacks using PSExec and WMI.

asr_rule: Block rebooting machine in Safe Mode (preview)
metadata_comment: Prevents attackers from rebooting machines into Safe Mode to disable security tools.

asr_rule: Block untrusted and unsigned processes that run from USB
metadata_comment: Prevents execution of potentially malicious files from USB devices, enhancing removable media security.

asr_rule: Block use of copied or impersonated system tools (preview)
metadata_comment: Mitigates attacks using copied or impersonated legitimate system tools.
Prevents the creation of webshells on servers, reducing the risk of web-based attacks and persistence.

asr_rule: Block Win32 API calls from Office macros
metadata_comment: Mitigates macro-based attacks by blocking dangerous API calls from Office macros.
Enhances ransomware protection by leveraging advanced detection and mitigation techniques.
